data.title: KACE Kontinuing Education (KKE) Recording: Inherit/Pass Info from Parent Ticket to Child Ticket (4287850)
data.meta_description: In this video, we will cover the new and improved Parent Child Ticket relationship feature of the KACE Systems Management Appliance or SM 4287850
data.text:
In this video, we will cover the new and improved Parent Child Ticket relationship feature of the KACE Systems Management Appliance or SMA.

This enhancement makes the Parent Child Ticket relationship more flexible, and provides more time savings by allowing child tickets to inherit information from the parent ticket.

Watch this video to learn more!
